---
title: "CzechVeg-Open"
format: html
---

CzechVeg-Open is a publicly available, full version of the Czech Vegetation Database, containing all vegetation-plot records included in the database. The taxonomy and nomenclature of plant taxa are not fully harmonized. It is available in two formats: the Turboveg 2 format, which requires the [Turboveg 2](https://czechvegetationdatabase.github.io/About/turboveg_windows.html) program, and the CSV format (see the [Data processing tutorial](https://czechvegetationdatabase.github.io/DataProcessingTutorial/data_processing_tutorial.html)).

**Version 1.0**

-   Compiled on: 28 November 2025
-   Size: 116,314 vegetation plots
-   DOI: TO BE ADDED
-   Turboveg 2 format
-   CSV format
